baseline: Assessments of depression and anxiety (IDA scale) and renal functioning (Marital Patterns Test) were also carried out.
high_intensity: Assessments of severe depression and extreme anxiety (IDA scale) and renal functioning (Marital Patterns Test) were also meticulously carried out.
low_intensity: Assessments of mild depression and minimal anxiety (IDA scale) and renal functioning (Marital Patterns Test) were also generally carried out.

baseline: The improved kappas for the anxiety disorders achieved a primary goal for this revision of the K-SADS.
high_intensity: The significantly improved kappas for the anxiety disorders achieved a critical primary goal for this revision of the K-SADS.
low_intensity: The slightly improved kappas for the anxiety disorders achieved a helpful primary goal for this revision of the K-SADS.

baseline: Symptoms of depression and anxiety were assessed using the Present State Examination and 'caseness' rated according to the Bedford College criteria.
high_intensity: Severe symptoms of depression and anxiety were assessed using the Present State Examination and 'caseness' rated according to the stringent Bedford College criteria.
low_intensity: Mild symptoms of depression and anxiety were assessed using the Present State Examination and 'caseness' rated according to the basic Bedford College criteria.
